verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Mmmm mmmmm mmmmm. x2
Wananchi wote tuungane pamoja.
Tujenge jumuiya
ya Afrika Mashariki
Wananchi wote tushikane mikono
tuimarishe wote amani kwa pamoja.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Tanzania nayo Kenya,
hata Uganda tushirikiane
Majirani toka Kongo,
Rwanda na Burundi tusaidiane
(Afrika Mashariki twafurahia sisi so-te
Afrika Mashariki
tunaiunga mkono). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Umoja wa nchi zote
tuuimarishe sote.
Tuweni taifa moja
na lenye upendo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Viongozi wetu wote
wawe na maelewano.
Mataifa yetu yote
yawe na upendo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sote sisi kama ndugu
tuudumishe upendo
Na kama taifa
moja tusaidiane.
